useCase.name: Manage Fault Management Job and Report

preconditions.precondition: The buyer/client has access to Fault Management system.

mainSequence.step: The Buyer/Client initiates a POST request to create a Fault Management Job.
The Fault Management Job is created in response to the request.
The Fault Management Job transitions to 'inProgress' state.
Data is generated for the Fault Management Job.
The generated data causes the creation of a Fault Management Report.
The Fault Management Report is created and transitions to 'inProgress' state.
Data is collected for the Fault Management Report.
The Fault Management Report transitions to 'completed' state.
The completed Fault Management Report is linked to the Fault Management Job.
The Fault Management Job completes its execution.
The Buyer/Client requests to get the Fault Management Report.
The Fault Management Report content is provided to the Buyer/Client.
